text:
Only come here for the western food as it's affordable and good. However the drinks shop lady is the rudest person I've met in my entire life. Wanted to pay by cash but I was short of a dollar so had to paynow and it took me a while to open my app as the reception was slow. I asked the lady politely "$4 correct?", she paused and looked at me for 10 seconds before saying "I said $4 what, I told you multipe times." in a very irritated tone and proceeded to 'confirm' with another customer. Even the customer seemed taken aback and had to just shrug it off. She told me 1-2 times but is it so wrong to confirm again??? It slipped off my mind when I had to open the payment app.

The drinks are also overly expensive priced at $2 for the amount they give. I won't be coming back again.
Drink stall auntie has bad attitude. Ordered kopi and ignored me.  She still prepare and left it next to her i have to stretch forward to take. Not happy don't come out work dude
Came here for the duck rice @ Kowloon Hong Kong Style Charcoal Roasted (Senja). A plate of duck rice will cost you $5. Pretty tasty.
Renovated but same old stalls. Sigh.

The incident at the self-service shop, the drinks shop (自助 服務 ) just happened, OMG, the old auntie is super rude, she should retire, it’s infair for people to encounter her or experience the service she provides, it was so incredibly rude. I've never encountered someone as rude as her before. OMG.
